meanings.meaning: get off to a good[poor] start in life
begin[start] one’s career as a journalist

vlive.korean: [겨우 용기 내 딛는 걸음] 이거 써봐도 되는 건가? [Make up their mind and step in] Are we allowed to use these? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 깊은 숲 속에서 단둘이 첫 외박을!? #여자가 사랑에 빠지는 순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP13
vlive.english: [Make up their mind and step in] Are we allowed to use these?

vlive.korean: 내딛으시길 바랍니다. and take those steps. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 인피니트 장동우 편
드디어 그 첫 발자국을 내딛으려고 합니다. is finally about to make their footprints. 듣기 View video UNB : UNB DEBUT [BOYHOOD] VIDEO ART SHOW
vlive.english: is finally about to make their footprints.

vlive.korean: [두번째 포인트 안무-STEP2 오른발은 그냥 옆으로 내딛고] 이게 오른발은 그냥 이렇게 해요. [Take a step to the right] You just do this with your right leg. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 모모의 DTNA🏄‍♀️ (HOW TO DANCE MOMO’s DTNA)
vlive.english: [Take a step to the right] You just do this with your right leg.

vlive.korean: 힘찬 발걸음 내딛기를 바랍니다. I hope you will venture out. 듣기 View video C-JeS : [REPLAY] 씨제스컬쳐SHOW 특급라이브 (CJeS Culture Show)
vlive.english: I hope you will venture out.

examples.korean: The old man was very shaky on his feet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 노인은 내딛는 발이 몹시 휘청거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The old man was very shaky on his feet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was unquestionably a step in the right direction. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 의심할 여지없이 옳은 방향으로 내딛는 발걸음이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was unquestionably a step in the right direction. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step. It is always the same step, but you have to take it. (Antoine de Saint-Exupery) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람의 생명을 구하는 것은 오직 한 걸음을 내딛는 것이다. 그리고 또 한 걸음. 항상 같은 걸음일지라도 내딛어야 한다. (생텍쥐페리, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step. It is always the same step, but you have to take it. (Antoine de Saint-Exupery) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is said to have helped more than 100 million people take their first steps to rise out of poverty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 1억 명 이상이 빈곤 탈출을 위한 첫 걸음을 내딛는 데 도움을 준 것으로 알려졌다. Neungyule
examples.english: It is said to have helped more than 100 million people take their first steps to rise out of poverty. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Clearly indicating the development of the essay in the introduction is an important step toward reaching your reader. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머리말에서 에세이의 전개과정을 명확하게 진술하는 것은 독자들을 향해 내딛는 중요한 순서이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Clearly indicating the development of the essay in the introduction is an important step toward reaching your reader. Add to Wordbook
